data.scheme_name: Gujarat State Biotechnology (BT) Policy 2022-27 -Incentives for Units with GFCI less than INR 200 Crores -Capital Assistance -Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides capital assistance @25% of eligible Gross Fixed capital Assistance with a ceiling of Rs.4000 lakh
data.eligibility: All biotechnology units are eligible under the scheme.
data.beneficiaries: All biotechnology units are eligible under the scheme.
data.context: The main purpose of this scheme is to make Gujarat a preferred and globally competitive destination for development of biotechnology products and services
data.objective:
• To promote ecosystem strengthening projects. To develop strategic and emerging sectors in biotechnology . 
  • To encourage sustainable living by promoting adoption of bio-technologies, biotechnology products and services. 
  • To achieve the following in next five years: Support at least 500 Units/ Businesses in biotechnology sector. 
  • Attract more than INR 20,000 crores of investments. Create more than 1.2 lakhs employment in biotechnology sector. Make Gujarat the leading state in Biotechnology
data.description:
Scheme provides capital assistance @25% of eligible Gross Fixed capital Assistance with a ceiling of Rs.4000 lakh Capital Assistance includes:- 

  • Capital Cost: Procurement and installation of various equipment, instrumentation, plant & machinery, building construction and other related fixed assets. 
  • Registration/ Stamp Duty: Stamp Duty & Registration Fee paid towards purchase/ lease/ transfer of land and/ or office space and fee paid towards conversion of land use from agriculture to non-Agriculture shall be eligible. Premium paid to Government for conversion of land use from agriculture to non-Agriculture shall not be eligible.
  • Technology Upgradation & Acquisition Support: In order to keep pace with the global manufacturing trends, the manufacturing sector needs to adopt latest technologies. With an aim to encourage innovation and adoption of sophisticated technologies under biotechnology, the State will provide fiscal support to eligible applicants in acquiring technologies from organizations within India and/ or outside India. 
  • Utilities: The Policy will support installation of various necessary utilities including Gas connection, Solar unit or any other captive power generation unit. Effluent Treatment Plant (ETP) or Zero Liquid Discharge (ZLD) Plant; Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning Systems (HVAC) and Captive Solar Power Plant are eligible for claims under Utilities.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply from this site https://dstpolicy.gujarat.gov.in/login
data.funding_facilitator: Gujarat State Biotechnology Mission, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: Capital Assistance shall be disbursed in Twenty (20) Quarterly installments spread over Five (5) years.
data.additional_info:
Gross Fixed Capital Investment (GFCI):- Eligible Gross Fixed Capital Investment is to be calculated in a manner that the expenditure on buildings cannot be more than 20% of the eligible GFCI. 

Also, expenses towards Computers & Software, Furniture & Fixtures, Office Equipment, Vehicles, etc. (movables items) will NOT be considered towards eligible GFCI. 

Expansion/ Diversification:- An expansion and/or diversification implies investment carried out by a Biotechnology unit with an objective of increasing production or service capability for Biotechnology products or services with or without forward/ backward integration, in Gujarat. 

For computing additional GFCI, the eligible investment at the site of existing production facility where expansion/ diversification is carried out, will be considered; provided that relocation of the plants from anywhere within Gujarat will not be allowed.

copy of Promoter's PAN and Aadhar card
